charges.charge_description: 18:1344 dft devised a scheme and artifice to obtain moneys, funds, credits, assets, securities or other property owned by and under the custody and control of Citibank, N.A., a financial institution whose deposits were and are insured by the FDIC by means of false and fraudulent pretenses and representations, 18:2113(b) did take and carry away with intent to steal and purloin approximately $50,0122.17, belong to and in the care, custody, management control and custody of Citibank, N.A., a bank whose deposits were then insured by FDIC
